tool.name: Aequatus generator
tool.description: generates aequatus format from tree, gene and alignment information.

param.name: alignmentFile
param.label: Alignment file
param.help: Alignment file in tabular format generated by 'T-Coffee to CIGAR'

param.name: treeFile
param.label: Tree file
param.help: Tree file in JSON format generated by 'Get gene tree by Ensembl ID' tool

param.name: genesFile
param.label: Gene file
param.help: Gene file in JSON format generated by 'GFF3 to JSON' or 'Get Ensembl features by ID' tool

param.name: sort
param.label: Sort the keys in the Aequatus JSON output
param.help: Ensure reproducibility, but can slow down the JSON creation for big files

tool.help:
Simple tool to generate datasets that can be visualised with `Aequatus`_.
Aequatus is an open-source homology browser developed with novel rendering approaches to visualise homologous, orthologous and paralogous gene structures.
.. _Aequatus: http://aequatus.tgac.ac.uk
